arts.ttl: Inter Milan Vs Cremonese – Nerazzurri Set To Make Changes In Defence & Midfield Ahead Of Serie A Clash
arts.sum: Inter vs Cremonese will see Cristian Chivu make changes as Marcus Thuram is sidelined with a muscular problem, meaning Ange-Yoan Bonny is expected to partner Lautaro Martinez in attack. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Vs Cremonese: Italy Star Plays Less Under Cristian Chivu Than Under Simone Inzaghi
arts.sum: Inter midfielder Davide Frattesi is seeing less playing time under Cristian Chivu than he did during the Simone Inzaghi era. The Italy star has managed only 72 minutes this season, all from the bench, as noted by FCInterNews. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Vs Cremonese – Predicted Lineup As Chivu Places Faith In Young Strike Duo
arts.sum: Inter Milan will continue with their trusted 3-5-2 system despite the injury absence of Marcus Thuram, with head coach Cristian Chivu ready to hand a chance to youngsters Ange-Yoan Bonny and Pio Esposito in the Frenchman’s absence. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Vs Cremonese – French Striker To Make His First Serie A Start For Nerazzurri
arts.sum: Ange-Yoan Bonny will reportedly make his first Serie A start for Inter Milan in Saturday’s home clash against newly promoted Cremonese. According to Gazzetta dello Sport via FCInter1908, the Frenchman is Cristian Chivu’s go-to option to replace Marcus Thuram.
